name: kcoh-software-website
description: KCOH Software Inc. - Professional software development portfolio website

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: terser script.js -o dist/script.min.js -c -m --comments /^!/ && terser terminal.js -o dist/terminal.min.js -c -m --comments /^!/
scripts.build:css: cleancss -o dist/styles.min.css styles.css && cleancss -o dist/quick-wins.min.css quick-wins.css
scripts.obfuscate: npm run obfuscate:script && npm run obfuscate:terminal
scripts.obfuscate:script: javascript-obfuscator script.js --output dist/script.obfuscated.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75
scripts.obfuscate:terminal: javascript-obfuscator terminal.js --output dist/terminal.obfuscated.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --dead-code-injection true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 0.75

author: KCOH Software Inc. <inquiries@kcoh.ca>
